author: austinhx
content: Hi Fluffy team, I am on the Core Developer Apprenticeship program and for my project, I plan to implement the use of uTP instead of UDP in the nim-eth implementation of Discovery v5. I will keep you guys updated on the progress!

author: pipermerriam
content:
Small correction in your statement which I'm sure you'll get ironed out as you research what needs to be done.  

BEP29 describes uTP which is a streaming transport built on top of UDP packets.

The proposed uTP over discv5 is still over UDP, but instead of uTP -> UDP it is uTP -> DiscV5 -> UPD.  So it's not "instead of UDP", but rather, just an expansion of the toolbox of tools we have to build protocols on top of discv5.
